WorkItem.Description:
Our application has embedded ressources in various assemblies used the the netoffice plugin.

The application crashes when accessing these resources.
If all ressources are moved to a seperate assembly the problem goes away.

However a fix in the netoffice code can also solve the problem.

Attached is a PDF document with the fix.
Will you apply this fix in upcomming release of the Netoffice components.

Comments.Message:
when its possible, please send me a sample solution[public.sebastian[at]web.de) to clearify the problem. it looks like the ressource feature use the assembly resolve service and i'm not aware to handle this. i want fix this immediately(first time i face this problem)

Sebastian
